channel.title: CVE Feed for tryinteract -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tryinteract -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5659|2024-08-02T08:07:32.472Z -- tryinteract -- interact%3A%20embed%20a%20quiz%20on%20your%20site
item.description: The Interact: Embed A Quiz On Your Site plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'interact-quiz' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 3.0.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
